report.title: Samples list for the home page
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l on l.id=s.location_id and l.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o on o.website_id=su.website_id and o.survey_id=su.id and o.sample_id=s.id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE s.deleted=false AND #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available
